awd_titl_txt: Development of a Computerized Metabolic Map
awd_abstract_narration: A currently working prototype system will be extended to develop                a computerized view of metabolic reactions that includes viewpoints             onto metabolic reactions that are difficult or impossible to                    achieve with existing textbook or wall-chart representations.  The              system will include the ability to search enzymatic reactions by                chemical groups, provide lists of all potential inhibitory sites                of a compound, and graphically output any desired segment of known              biochemical pathways.  The system will provide varied access paths              to information about metabolism by removing artificial limits to                thinking imposed by fixed printed implementations currently                     available.  The system is expected to serve the needs of a wide                 variety of researchers interested in biochemical pathways, as well              as providing an educational tool for students at every level of                 expertise.
